A Fast, Secure, and Scalable Recursive DNS Server (pt-br)

Link to full Blog Post

In March 2023, I wrote a blog post on dev.to titled “Um servidor DNS Recursivo rápido, seguro e escalável (A Fast, Secure, and Scalable Recursive DNS Server).” The post talks about Unbound, Recursive DNS, and best practices in security, while also providing guidance on creating your own DNS.

  • It received more than 1k views across all platforms,
  • It was re-published on Linkedin,

You can read the full blog post on dev.to.
